mutants.original_line: return ''.join(char * freq for char, freq in count.most_common())
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join((char * freq for (char, freq) in count.most_common()))

mutants.original_line: return ''.join(char * freq for char, freq in count.most_common())
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join((char / freq for (char, freq) in count.most_common()))

mutants.original_line: return ''.join(char * freq for char, freq in count.most_common())
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join((char + freq for (char, freq) in count.most_common()))

mutants.original_line: return ''.join(char * freq for char, freq in count.most_common())
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join((char ** freq for (char, freq) in count.most_common()))
